definition: to scale (a height)/to ascend/to mount/to publish or record/to enter (e.g. in a register)/to press down with the foot/to step or tread on/to put on (shoes or trousers) (dialect)/to be gathered and taken to the threshing ground (old)

sentences.english: Tank landing ships are used for amphibious operations.
sentences.chinese: 坦克登陸艦用於兩棲作戰。

sentences.english: From afar, the car by the island resembles a ship mooring landing ships.
sentences.chinese: 遠遠望去，車由島酷似一艘錨泊的登陸艦。

sentences.english: AWACS Thunderhead Enemy assault ships are launching attack helicopters.
sentences.chinese: 敵均強襲登陸艦投放直升機了。
